[HP Not Decrease v1.0]
580999EC E1D021B0
5066701C 00000000
0066701C 00000010
D0000000 00000000
D0000000 00000000
6066701C 00000000 <---- if value in 0x0066701C is not equal to 0x00
D9000000 0066701C <---- set data to 0x0066701C
D4000000 FFFFFFFF <---- add 0xFFFFFFFF to 0x0066701C (total 0x10066701B)
D6000000 0066701C <---- write data to 0x0066701C
D0000000 00000000 <---- end if instruction (line 685)
D3000000 00000000 <---- sets offset to 0
5066701C 00000001 <---- if value in 0x0066701C is 0x00000001 continue
08105F94 E1D021B0 <---- write 
08105F98 E92D407C
08105F9C E59F2024
08105FA0 E59F3024
08105FA4 E2834018
08105FA8 E4925004
08105FAC E4936004
08105FB0 E1500005
08105FB4 11500006
08105FB8 03A01000
08105FBC E1530004
08105FC0 1AFFFFF8
08105FC4 E8BD807C
08105FC8 30000404
08105FCC 300073EC
080999EC EB01B168
D0000000 00000000


[PP Not Decrease v1.0]
5808F868 E1A04000 <---- if read of 0x0808F868 is 0xE1A04000 and
50667020 00000000 <---- read of 0x00667020 is 0x00 then
00667020 00000010 <---- write 0x00000010 to 0x00667020
D0000000 00000000 <---- close if
D0000000 00000000 <---- close if
60667020 00000000 <---- if read of 0x00667020 is not 0x00 then 
D9000000 00667020 <---- sets DxData to read 0x00667020 (?)
D4000000 FFFFFFFF <---- adds 0xFFFFFFFF to DxData (00667020 + FFFFFFFF)
D6000000 00667020 <---- copies word value (?) of DxData to 0x00667020
D0000000 00000000 <---- close line 717 if statement
D3000000 00000000 <---- set the offset to 0x00 (reset it)
50667020 00000001 <---- if word value at 0x00667020 is 0x01 then
08105FD4 E1A04000 + 0x00
08105FD8 E92D4007 + 0x04
08105FDC E59F0018 + 0x08
08105FE0 E2801018 + 0x0C
08105FE4 E4902004 + 0x10
08105FE8 E1560002 + 0x14
08105FEC 03A04000 + 0x18
08105FF0 E1510000 + 0x1C
08105FF4 1AFFFFFA + 0x20
08105FF8 E8BD8007 + 0x24
08105FFC 300073EC + 0x28
0808F868 EB01D9D9
